sentences.text: April 26, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Fellow Stockholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are cordially invited to attend the Annual Meeting of Stockholders of TripAdvisor, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will hold the Annual Meeting on Thursday, June 22, 2017, at 1:00 p.m. local time at the Residence Inn, 80 B Street, Needham, MA 02494.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the Annual Meeting, stockholders will be asked (1) to elect the eight directors named in this Proxy Statement, (2) to ratify the appointment of KPMG LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017, and (3) to consider and act upon any other business that may properly come before the meeting and any adjournments or postponements thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boar of Directors recommends a vote FOR proposals (1) and (2).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote if you were a stockholder of record on April 24, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote via the Internet or by telephone by following the instructions on your Notice of Internet Availability and on the website noted in the Notice of Internet Availability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to vote via the Internet or by telephone, you must have your stockholder identification number, which is provided in your Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you have requested a proxy card by mail, you may vote by signing, voting and returning that proxy card in the envelope provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you attend the Annual Meeting, you may vote in person even if you have previously returned your proxy card or have voted via the Internet or by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is very important to us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please review the instructions for each voting option described in the Notice and in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your prompt cooperation will be greatly appreciated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: STEPHEN KAUFER President and Chief Executive Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TRIPADVISOR, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: edham, Massachusetts 02

sentences.text: NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS To Be Held on June 22, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Meeting of Stockholders of TripAdvisor, Inc., a Delaware corporation, will be held on Thursday, June 22, 2017, at 1:00 p.m. local time at the Residence Inn, 80 B Street,  Needham, MA 02494.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the Annual Meeting, stockholders will be asked to consider the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. To elect the eight directors named in this Proxy Statement, each to serve for a one-year term from the date of his or her election and until such directors successor is elected or until such directors earlier resignation or removal;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. To ratify the appointment of KPMG LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending cember 31, 2017; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. To consider and act upon any other business that may properly come before the Annual Meeting and any adjournments or postponements thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only holders of record of outstanding shares of TripAdvisor capital stock at the close of business on April 24, 2017 are entitled to notice of and to vote at the Annual Meeting and at any adjournments or postponements thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the rules of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, we will furnish proxy materials over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will send to our stockholders a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials on or about April 26, 2017, and provide access to our proxy materials over the Internet to our holders of record and beneficial owners of our capital stock as of the close of business on the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only stockholders and persons holding proxies from stockholders may attend the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered in your name, you must bring a form of identification to the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in the name of a broker, trust, bank or other nominee, you must bring a proxy or letter from that broker, trust, bank or other nominee that confirms that you are the beneficial owner of those shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Order of the Board of Directors,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SETH J. KALVERT Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: April 26, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROCEDURAL MATTERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement is being furnished to holders of common stock and Class B common stock of TripAdvisor, Inc., a Delaware corporation, in connection with the solicitation of proxies by TripAdvisors Board of Directors for use at its 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders or any adjournment or postponement thereof (the Annual Meeting).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All references to TripAdvisor, the Company, we, our or us in this Proxy Statement are to TripAdvisor, Inc. and its subsidiaries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An Annual Report to Stockholders, containing financial statements for the year ended December 31, 2016, and this Proxy Statement are being made available to all stockholders entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TripAdvisors principal executive offices are currently located at 400 1st Avenue, Needham, Massachusetts 02494.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement i being made available to TripAdvisor stockholders on or about April 26, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Date, Time and Place of Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Meeting will be held on Thursday, June 22, 2017, at 1:00 p.m. local time at the Residence Inn, 80 B Street, Needham, MA  02494.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only stockholders and persons holding proxies from stockholders may attend the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered in your name, you must bring a form of identification to the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in the name of a broker, trust, bank or other nominee, otherwise known as holding in street name, you must bring a proxy or letter from that broker, trust, bank or other nominee that confirms you are he beneficial owner of those shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cameras and recording devices will not be permitted at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Record Date and Voting Rights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors established the close of business on April 24, 2017 as the record date for determining the holders of TripAdvisor common stock entitled to notice of and to vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On the record date, 128,411,141 shares of common stock and 12,799,999 shares of Class B common stock were outstanding and entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TripAdvisor stockholders are entitled to one vote for each share of common stock and ten votes for each share of Class B common stock held as of the record date, voting together as a single voting group, in
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the election of six of the eight director nominees and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the ratification of the appointment of KPMG LLP as TripAdvisors independent registered public accounting firm for the year ending December 31, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TripAdvisor stockholders are entitled to one vote for each share of common stock held as of the record date in the election of the two director nominees that the holders of TripAdvisor common stock are entitled to elect as a separate class pursuant to TripAdvisors restated certificate of incorporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On August 27, 2014, the entire beneficial ownership of our common stock and Class B common stock held by Liberty Interactive Corporation (Liberty) was transferred to Liberty TripAdvisor Holdings, Inc. (LTRIP).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Simultaneously, Liberty, LTRIPs former parent company, distributed, by means of a dividend, to the holders of its Liberty Ventures common stock, Libertys entire equity interest in LTRIP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We refer to this transaction as the Liberty Spin-Off.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result of the Liberty Spin-Off, effective August 27, 2014, LTRIP became a separate, publicly traded company and 100% of Libertys interest in TripAdvisor was held by LTRIP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Liberty also assigned to LTRIP its rights and obligations under the Governance Agreement between TripAdvisor and Liberty, dated December 20, 2011 (the Governance Agreement).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result of these transactions, as of the record date, LTRIP beneficially owned 18,159,752 shares of our common stock and 12,799,999 shares of our Class B common stock, which shares constitute 14.1% of the outstanding shares of common stock and 100% of the outstanding shares of Class B Common Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Assuming the conversion of all of the LTRIPs shares of Class B common stock into common stock, as of the record date LTRIP would beneficially own 21.9% of the outstanding common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because each share of Class B common stock generally is entitled to ten votes per share and each share of common stock is entitled to one vote per share, as of the record date LTRIP may be deemed to beneficially own equity securities representing 57.0% of our voting power.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, regardless of the vote of any other TripAdvisor stockholder, LTRIP has control over the vote relating to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the election of six of the eight director nominees and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the ratification of the appointment of KPMG LLP as TripAdvisors independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Quorum; Abstentions; Broker Non-Votes
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Transaction of business at the Annual Meeting may occur if a quorum is present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a quorum is not present, it is expected that the Annual Meeting will be adjourned or postponed in order to permit additional time for soliciting and obtaining additional proxies or votes, and, at any subsequent reconvening of the Annual Meeting, all proxies will be voted in the same manner as such proxies would have been voted at the original convening of the Annual Meeting, except for any proxies that have been effectively revoked or withdrawn.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the election of six of the eight director nominees and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the ratification of the appointment of KPMG LLP as TripAdvisors independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017, the presence at the Annual Meeting, in person or by proxy, of the holders of a majority of the total votes entitled to be cast constitutes a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the election of the two directors whom the holders of TripAdvisor common stock are entitled to elect as a separate class, the presence at the Annual Meeting, in person or by proxy of the holders of a majority of shares of common stock constitutes a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a share is represented for any purpose at the meeting, it is deemed to be present for quorum purposes and for all other matters as well.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares of TripAdvisor capital stock represented by a properly executed proxy will be treated as present at the Annual Meeting for purposes of determining a quorum, without regard to whether the proxy is marked as casting a vote or abstaining.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are counted as present and entitled to vote for purposes of determining a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A broker non-vote occurs when a nominee holding shares for a beneficial owner does not vote the shares on a proposal because the nominee does not have discretionary voting power for a particular item and has not received instructions from the beneficial owner regarding voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Brokers who hold shares for the accounts of their clients have discretionary authority to vote shares if specific instructions are not given with respect to the ratification of the appointment of our independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Brokers do not have discretionary authority to vote on the election of our directors, so we encourage you to provide instructions to your broker regarding the voting of your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Solicitation of Proxies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TripAdvisor will bear the cost of the solicitation of proxies from its stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to solicitation by mail, the directors, officers and employees of TripAdvisor, without additional compensation, may solicit proxies from stockholders by telephone, by letter, by facsimile, in person or otherwise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following the original mailing of the proxies and other soliciting materials, TripAdvisor will ask brokers, trusts, banks or other nominees to forward copies of the proxy and other soliciting materials to persons for whom they hold shares of TripAdvisor capital stock and o request authority for the exercise of proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In such cases, TripAdvisor, upon the request of the brokers, trusts, banks and other stockholder nominees, will reimburse such holders for their reasonable expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting of Proxies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The manner in which your shares may be voted depends on whether you are a:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registered stockholder:    Your shares are represented by certificates or book entries in your name on the records of TripAdvisors stock transfer agent and you have the right to vote those shares directly; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial stockholder:    You hold your shares in street name through a broker, trust, bank or other nominee and you have the right to direct your broker, trust, bank or other nominee on how to vote the shares in your account; however, you must request and receive a valid proxy from your broker, trust, bank or other nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether you hold shares directly as a registered stockholder or beneficially as a beneficial stockholder, you may direct how your shares are voted without attending the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For directions on how to vote, please refer to the instructions below and those on the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials, proxy card or voting instruction form provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To vote using the Internet or by telephone, you will be required to enter the control number included on your Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials or other voting instruction form provided by your broker, trust, bank or other nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Using the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registered stockholders may vote using the Internet by going to www.proxyvote.com and following the instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial stockholders may vote by accessing the website specified on the voting instruction forms provided by their brokers, trusts, banks or other nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registered stockholders may vote, from within the United States, using any touch-tone telephone by calling 1-800- 690-6903 and following the recorded instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial owners may vote, from within the United States, using any touch-tone telephone by calling the number specified on the voting instruction forms provided by their brokers, trusts, banks or other nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registered stockholders may submit proxies by mail by requesting printed proxy cards and marking, signing and dating the printed proxy cards and mailing them in the accompanying pre-addressed envelopes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial owners may vote by marking, signing and dating the voting instruction forms provided by their brokers, trusts, banks or other nominees and mailing them in the accompanying pre-addressed envelopes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All proxies properly submitted and not revoked will be voted at the Annual Meeting in accordance with the instructions indicated thereon.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If no instructions are provided, such proxies will be voted FOR proposals (1) and (2) described in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TripAdvisor is incorporated under Delaware law, which specifically permits electronically transmitted proxies, provided that each such proxy contains, or is submitted with, information from which the inspector of elections can determine that such proxy was authorized by the stockholder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The electronic voting procedures provided for the Annual Meeting are designed to authenticate each stockholder by use of a control number, to allow stockholders to vote their shares and to confirm that their instructions have been properly recorded.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting in Person at the Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also vote in person at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Votes in person will replace any previous votes you have made by mail or telephone o via the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will provide a ballot to registered stockholders who request one at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares held in your name as the stockholder of record may be voted on that ballot.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares held beneficially in street name may be voted on a ballot only if you bring a legal proxy from the broker, trust, bank or other nominee that holds your shares giving you the right to vote the shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attendance at the Annual Meeting without voting or revoking a previous proxy in accordance with the voting procedures will not in and of itself revoke a proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is very important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you plan to attend the Annual Meeting, please take the time to vote via the Internet, by telephone or by returning your marked, signed and dated proxy card so that your shares will be represented at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Revocation of Proxies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any proxy given pursuant to this solicitation may be revoked by the person giving it any time before the taking of the vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial stockholder, you may revoke your proxy or change your vote only by following the separate instructions provided by your broker, trust, bank or other nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered stockholder, you may revoke your proxy at any time before it is exercised at the Annual Meeting by
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) delivering written notice, bearing a date later than the proxy, stating that the proxy is revoked,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) submitting a later-dated proxy relating to the same shares by mail or telephone or via the Internet prior to the vote at the Annual Meeting or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) attending the Annual Meeting and properly giving notice of revocation to the inspector of elections or voting in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registered holders may send any written notice or request for a new proxy card to TripAdvisor, Inc., c/o Broadridge, 51 Mercedes Way, Edgewood, New York 11717, or follow the instructions provided on the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials and proxy card to submit a new proxy by telephone or via the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registered holders may also request a new proxy card by calling 1-800-579-1639.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Business
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors does not presently intend to bring any business before the Annual Meeting other than the proposals discussed in this Proxy Statement and specified in the Notice of Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has no knowledge of any other matters to be presented at the Annual Meeting other than those described in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any other matters should properly come before the Annual Meeting, the persons designated in the proxy will vote on them according to their best judgment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 1: ELECTION OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Overview
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors currently consists of eight members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to the terms of TripAdvisors bylaws, each director serves for a one- year term from the date of his or her election and until such directors successor is elected or until such directors earlier resignation or removal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the eight nominees is named below and the Board of Directors recommends that each be elected to serve a one-year term and until such directors successor shall have been duly elected and qualified or until such directors earlier resignation or removal:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Gregory B. Maffei Stephen Kaufer Dipchand (Deep) Nishar Jeremy Philips Spencer M. Rascoff Albert E. Rosenthaler Sukhinder Singh Cassidy Robert S. Wiesenthal
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TripAdvisors restated certificate of incorporation provides that the holders of TripAdvisor common stock, acting as a single class, are entitled to elect a number of directors equal to 25% of the total number of directors, rounded up to the next whole number, which will be two directors as of the date of the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has designated Messrs. Philips and Wiesenthal as nominees for the positions on the Board to be elected by the holders of TripAdvisor common stock voting as a separate class.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to the Governance Agreement, LTRIP has the right to nominate up to a number of directors equal to 20% of the total number of the directors on the Board of Directors (rounded up to the next whole number if the number of directors on the Board of Directors is not an even multiple of five) for election to the Board of Directors and has certain other rights regarding committee participation, so long as certain stock ownership requirements applicable to LTRIP are satisfied.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LTRIP has designated Messrs. Maffei and Rosenthaler as its nominees to the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although management does not anticipate that any of the nominees named above will be unable or unwilling to stand for election, in the event of such an occurrence, proxies may be voted for a substitute nominee designated by the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Information Regarding Director Nominees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The information provided below about each nominee is as of the date of this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The information presented includes the names of each of the nominees, along with his or her age, any positions held with the company, term of office as a director, principal occupations or employment for the past five years or more, involvement in certain legal proceedings, if applicable, and the names of all other publicly-held companies for which he or she currently serves as a director or has served as a director during the past five years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The information also includes a description of the specific experience, qualifications, attributes and skills of each nominee that led our Board of Directors to conclude that he or she should serve as a director of the company for the ensuing term.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Gregory B. Maffei, age 56, has been the Chairman of the Board of Directors of TripAdvisor since February 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Maffei has served as a director as well as the President and Chief Executive Officer of Liberty Media Corporation (LMC) (including its predecessor) since May 2007 LTRIP since July 2013 and Liberty Broadband Corporation (LBC) since June 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He has served as President and Chief Executive Officer of Liberty since February 2006 and as a director since November 2005.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also served as CEO-Elect of Liberty from November 2005 through February 2006.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining Liberty in 2005, Mr. Maffei served as President and Chief Financial Officer of Oracle Corporation; Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of 360networks Corporation and Chief Financial Officer of Microsoft Corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Maffei also currently serves as a director of the following companies:  Sirius XM Holdings Inc., Live Nation Entertainment, Inc., Charter Communications, Inc. and Zillow
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Group, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Maffei is a member of the Board of Trustees of Dartmouth College and Council on Foreign Relations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Maffei previously served on the Board of Directors of Starz, Electronic Arts, Inc., Barnes & Noble, Inc., Citrix Systems, Inc., DirecTV, Starbucks Corp., and Dorling Kindersley Limited.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Maffei holds an M.B.A. from Harvard Business School, where he was a Baker Scholar, and an A.B. from Dartmouth College.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Membership Qualifications:    Mr. Maffei brings to our Board significant financial and operational experience based on his senior policy-making positions at Liberty, LMC, LBC, LTRIP, Oracle, 360networks and Microsoft and his other public company board experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He provides our board with an executive and leadership perspective on the operation and management of large public companies and risk management principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stephen Kaufer, age 54, co-founded TripAdvisor in February 2000 and has been the President and Chief Executive Officer of TripAdvisor since that date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Kaufer has been a director of TripAdvisor since the completion of the spin-off of TripAdvisor from Expedia, Inc. (Expedia) in December 2011 (the Spin-Off).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Kaufer also serves as President and Chairman of the Board of The TripAdvisor Charitable Foundation, a private charitable foundation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to co-founding TripAdvisor, Mr. Kaufer served as President of CDS, Inc., an independent software vendor specializing in programming and testing tools, and co-founded CenterLine Software and served as its Vice President of Engineering.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Kaufer serves on the boards of several privately-held companies, including CarGurus, LLC, LiveData, Inc., and GlassDoor, Inc., as well as the charity Neuroendocrine Tumor Research Foundation (formerly known as Caring for Carcinoid Foundation).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Kaufer holds an A.B. in Computer Science from Harvard University.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Membership Qualifications:    As co-founder of TripAdvisor and through his service as its Chief Executive Officer, Mr. Kaufer has extensive knowledge of TripAdvisors business and operations, and significant experience in the online advertising sector of the global travel industry.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Kaufer also possesses strategic and governance skills gained through his executive and director roles with several privately-held companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dipchand (Deep) Nishar, age 48, has been a director of TripAdvisor since September 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since June 2015, Mr. Nishar has been Managing Director of SoftBank.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to that, from January 2009 to October 2014, Mr. Nishar served in various roles with LinkedIn Corporation, most recently as Senior Vice President, Products and User Experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From August 2003 to January 2009, Mr. Nishar served in various roles with Google Inc., most recently as the Senior Director of Products for the Asia-Pacific region.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Nishar served on the Board of Directors of OPower, Inc. from August 2013 to June 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Nishar holds an M.B.A. with highest honors (Baker Scholar) from Harvard Business School, an M.SEE from University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign, and a B.Tech with honors from the Indian Institute of Technology.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Membership Qualifications:     Mr. Nishar has significant operational experience in those areas which are directly applicable to TripAdvisors business and areas of focus.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Nishar has an extensive background in the Internet industry and, in particular, the digital media and online advertising sectors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He has been a general partner of Spark Capital since May 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From January 2012 until May 2014, Mr. Philips invested in private technology companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From June 2010 to January 2012, Mr. Philips served as the Chief Executive Officer of Photon Group Limited, a holding company listed on the Australian Securities Exchange.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From July 2004 to March 2010, Mr. Philips held various roles of increasing responsibility with News Corporation, most recently as an Executive Vice President in the Office of the Chairman.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining News Corporation, he served in several roles, including co-founder and Vice-Chairman of ecorp, a publicly traded Internet holding company, and as an analyst at McKinsey & Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Philips is a director of several private Internet companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is an adjunct professor at Columbia Business School and holds a B.A. and LL.B.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: from the University of New South Wales and an MPA from the Harvard Kennedy School of Government.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also possesses a high level of financial literacy and expertise regarding mergers, acquisitions, investments and other strategic transactions as well as an extensive background in the Internet industry.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Rascoff has served as the Chief Executive Officer of Zillow Group, Inc. since September 2010 and has served as a member of its Board of Directors since July 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Rascoff joined Zillow as one of its founding employees in 2005 as Vice President of Marketing and Chief Financial Officer from December 2008 to September 2010.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 2003 to 2005, Mr. Rascoff served as Vice President of Lodging for Expedia.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 1999, Mr. Rascoff co-founded Hotwire, Inc., an online travel company, and managed several of Hotwires product lines before Hotwire was acquired in 2003 by IAC/InterActiveCorp, or IAC, Expedias parent company at the time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Rascoff previously served in the mergers and acquisitions group at Goldman, Sachs & Co., an investment banking and securities firm, and an associate at TPG Capital, a private equity firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Rascoff serves on the Seattle Childrens Hospital Research Institute Advisory Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Rascoff  served on the Board of Directors of  Julep Beauty Incorporated, a privately-held beauty products company, from February 2013 to December 2016.

sentences.text: Mr. Rascoff graduated cum laude with a B.A. in Government and Economics from Harvard University.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Rascoff also possesses a high level of financial literacy and expertise regarding mergers, acquisitions, investments and other strategic transactions as well as an extensive background in the Internet industry and global travel industry.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to that, Mr. Rosenthaler served as a Senior Vice President of LMC (including its predecessor) from May 2007 to December 2015, a Senior Vice President of Liberty from April 2002 to December 2015 and a Senior Vice President of LBC from June 2014 to December 2015.

sentences.text: Mr. Rosenthaler brings a unique perspective to our Board of Directors, focused in particular on the area of tax management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Rosenthalers perspective and expertise assist the Board in developing strategies that take into consideration a wide range of issues resulting from the application and evolution of tax laws and regulations.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Previously, Ms. Singh Cassidy worked with Yodlee.com, Amazon.com and News Corporation, and in investment banking with Merrill Lynch & Co., Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She has also served on the Princeton Computer Science Advisory Council as well as the board of Jobtrain, a non-profit focused on vocational training for troubled youth and adults.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Singh Cassidy graduated from the University of Western Ontario and earned her H.B.A. from the Richard Ivey School of Business.

sentences.text: Board Membership Qualifications:    Through her experience as a consumer Internet and media executive, Ms. Singh Cassidy has in-depth knowledge of the online media and advertising sectors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Singh Cassidy also possesses extensive executive, strategic and operational experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Robert S. Wiesenthal, age 50, has been a director of TripAdvisor since December 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since July 2015, Mr. Wiesenthal has served as founder and Chief Executive Officer of FlyBlade, Inc., a short distance aviation company that leverages mobile technology and crowdsourcing business processes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From January 2013 to July 2015, Mr. Wiesenthal served as Chief Operating Officer of Warner Music Group Corp., a leading global music conglomerate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 2000 to 2012, Mr. Wiesenthal served in various senior executive capacities with Sony Corporation, most recently as Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Sony Corporation of America.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining Sony, from 1988 to 2000, Mr. Wiesenthal served in various capacities with Credit Suisse First Boston, most recently as Managing Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Wiesenthal previously served on the Board of Directors of Starz.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Wiesenthal has a B.A. from the University of Rochester.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Membership Qualifications:    Mr. Wiesenthal possesses extensive strategic, operational and financial experience, gained through his wide range of service in executive-level positions with a strong focus on networked consumer electronics, entertainment, and digital media.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also has a high degree of financial literacy and expertise regarding mergers, acquisitions, investments and other strategic transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of our nominees also have extensive management experience in complex organizations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to the information presented regarding each nominees specific experience, qualifications, attributes and skills that led the Board of Directors to the conclusion that he or she should be nominated as a director, each nominee has demonstrated business acumen and an ability to exercise sound judgment, as well as a commitment to TripAdvisor and our Board of Directors as demonstrated by the nominees past service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors considered the NASDAQ requirement that TripAdvisors Audit Committee be composed of at least three independent directors, as well as specific NASDAQ and U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) requirements regarding financial literacy and expertise.

Maffei, Kaufer, Nishar, Rascoff and Rosenthaler as directors requires the affirmative vote of a plurality of the total number of votes cast by the holders of shares of TripAdvisor common stock and Class B common stock, present in person or represented by proxy, voting together as a single class.

sentences.text: Board of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the NASDAQ Stock Market Listing Rules (the NASDAQ Rules), the Board has a responsibility to make an affirmative determination that those members of the Board who serve as independent directors do not have any relationships that would interfere with the exercise of independent judgment in carrying out the responsibilities of a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In connection with the independence determinations described below, the Board reviewed information regarding transactions, relationships and arrangements relevant to independence, including those required by the NASDAQ Rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This information is obtained from director responses to questionnaires circulated by management, as well as our records and publicly available information.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following this determination, management monitors those transactions, relationships and arrangements that were relevant to such determination, as well as solicits updated information potentially relevant to independence from internal personnel and directors, to determine whether there have been any developments that could potentially have an adverse impact on the Boards prior independence determination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has determined that each of Ms. Singh Cassidy and Messrs. Nishar, Philips, Rascoff and Wiesenthal is an independent director as defined by the NASDAQ Rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In making its independence determinations, the Board of Directors considered the applicable legal standards and any relevant transactions, relationships or arrangements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to the satisfaction of the director independence requirements set forth in the NASDAQ Rules, members of the Audit Committee and Compensation Committees have also satisfied separate independence requirements under the current standards imposed by the SEC and the NASDAQ Rules for audit committee members and by the SEC, NASDAQ Rules and the Internal Revenue Service for compensation committee members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Controlled Company Status
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On August 27, 2014, the entire beneficial ownership of our common stock and Class B common stock held by Liberty was transferred to LTRIP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Simultaneously, Liberty, LTRIPs former parent company, distributed, by means of a dividend, to the holders of its Liberty Ventures common stock, Libertys entire equity interest in LTRIP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We refer to this transaction as the Liberty Spin-Off.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result of the Liberty Spin-Off, effective August 27, 2014, LTRIP became a separate, publicly traded company and 100% of Libertys interest in TripAdvisor was held by LTRIP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the record date, LTRIP beneficially owned 18,159,752 shares of our common stock and 12,799,999 shares of our Class B common stock, which shares constitute 14.1% of the outstanding shares of common stock and 100% of the outstanding shares of Class B common stock, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Assuming the conversion of all of LTRIPs shares of Class B common stock into common stock, LTRIP would beneficially own 21.9% of the outstanding common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because each share of Class B common stock generally is entitled to ten votes per share and each share of common stock is entitled to one vote per share, LTRIP may be deemed to beneficially own equity securities representing approximately 57.0% of our voting power.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LTRIP has filed a Statement of Beneficial Ownership on Schedule 13D with respect to its TripAdvisor holdings and related voting arrangements with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The NASDAQ Rules exempt controlled companies, or companies of which more than 50% of the voting power is held by an individual, a group or another company, such as TripAdvisor, from certain governance requirements under the NASDAQ Rules, including, among other items the requirement that our Board of Directors be comprised of a majority of independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On this basis, TripAdvisor is relying on the exemption for controlled companies from certain requirements under the NASDAQ Rules, including, among others, the requirement that the Compensation Committees be composed solely of independent directors and certain requirements relating to the nomination of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We may, in the future, rely on other exemptions available to a controlled company, including, among others, the requirement that a majority of the Board of Directors be composed of independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Leadership Structure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Maffei serves as the Chairman of the Board of Directors, and Mr. Kaufer serves as President and Chief Executive Officer of TripAdvisor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The roles of Chief Executive Officer and Chairman of the Board of Directors are currently separated in recognition of the differences between the two roles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This leadership structure provides us with the benefit of Mr. Maffeis oversight of TripAdvisors strategic goals and vision, coupled with the benefit of a full-time Chief Executive Officer dedicated to focusing on the day-to-day management and continued growth of TripAdvisor and its operating businesses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that it is in the best interests of our stockholders for the Board of Directors to make a determination regarding the separation or combination of these roles each time it elects a new Chairman or Chief Executive Officer based on the relevant facts and circumstances applicable at such time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent members of the Board of Directors chair our Audit Committee, Compensation Committee and Section 16 Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meeting Attendance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors met four times in 2016 and acted by written consent one time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During such period, each member of the Board of Directors attended at least 75% of the meetings of the Board and the Board committees on which they served.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent directors meet in regularly scheduled sessions, typically before or after each Board meeting, without the presence of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not have a lead independent director or any other formally appointed leader for these sessions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors are encouraged but not required to attend annual meetings of TripAdvisor stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the incumbent directors who were directors at the time have historically attended the annual meetings of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Committees of the Board of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has the following standing committees: the Audit Committee, the Compensation Committee, the Section 16 Committee and the Executive Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit, Compensation and Section 16 Committees operate under written charters adopted by the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These charters are available in the Corporate Governance section of the Investor Relations page of TripAdvisors corporate website at ir.tripadvisor.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At each regularly scheduled Board meeting, the Chairperson of each committee provides the full Board of Directors with an update of all significant matters discussed, reviewed, considered and/or approved by the relevant committee since the last regularly scheduled Board meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The membership of our Audit, Compensation and Section 16 Committees ensures that directors with no ties to Company management are charged with oversight for all financial reporting and executive compensation related decisions made by Company management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is appointed by the Board of Directors to assist the Board with a variety of matters discussed in detail in the Audit Committee charter, including monitoring

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee consists of Ms. Singh Cassidy and Messrs.  Maffei and Nishar.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) approving all grants of equity awards, but excluding matters governed by Rule 16b-3 under the Exchange Act (which are handled by the Section 16 Committee described below).
